denial_summary: Additional documentation request not satisfied due to lack of medical records within the required timeframe.
likely_missing_items: Documentation from providers other than yourself to substantiate medical conditions
Copy of unusual circumstance waiver notification
recommended_actions: Submit documentation from providers other than yourself to substantiate medical conditions
Provide copy of unusual circumstance waiver notification, if applicable
appeal_guidance: If continuing submission of paper claims is due to medical restrictions, provide evidence as described above. If an unusual circumstance waiver was obtained, submit a copy of the notification.
